channel.title: diamondburned's stupid blog posts
channel.description: Recent content on diamondburned's stupid blog posts

item.title: My Hugo theme and thoughts on Gitment
item.description: Another day with JavaScript is another struggle I have to say, JavaScript is not a fun language to work on. The story is, today, Luke (the guy who requested me to fork Tale), asked me if I know of any method to add comments into his Hugo blog. I then thought, “hey that’d be nice if my theme integrates that.” I did just that. How I came up with it Luke is a Linux user, and like many Linux users, privacy is priority.

item.title: Migrating over to Hugo
item.description: “Migrating over to Hugo is very easy.” This was my thought when I first make a document for my bot. I was astonished by the speed of it. I was able to edit the markdown pages and instantly preview it when I need to. The theme I used was very flexible, and although I had trouble with the Hugo template, I quickly got used to it and changed most of the theme.
